column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Gros Islet
#Text=Gros Islet is a town at the far northern end of Saint Lucia .
#Text=It is the newest town in Saint Lucia , being the most recent to have been promoted from being a village .
#Text=There is a small beach at Gros Islet , but there are larger beaches and several large tourists resorts within walking distance to the north .
#Text=Heading south , past the marina , the main beach on the west coast is Reduit Beach .
#Text=The beaches on the east coast are exposed to the Atlantic wind , but are still largely untouched .
#Text=Rodney Bay Marina is to the south and becomes a hub of activity when the Atlantic Ralley for Cruisers ( ARC ) finishes there in December .
#Text=Beausejour Cricket Stadium is just outside of Gros Islet and was a venue for the 2007 Cricket World Cup .
#Text=Get in
#Text=The local bus service 1a runs regularly from Castries .
#Text=A single should cost about EC$ 2.50.
#Text=Get around
#Text=Buses are the least expensive method of travelling .
#Text=The bus route ( 1A ) leaves from Gros Islet to Castries every few minutes .
#Text=Minimum fare is EC$ 1.50 , maximum fare is EC$ 2.50 , per person .
#Text=The buses have an ' M ' prefix on their registration plates .
#Text=Taxis are numerous outside the large resorts , Rodney Bay and Castries , cost should be EC$ 60 between Gros Islet and Castries or EC$ 25 between Gros Islet and Rodney Bay .
#Text=Taxis have a TX prefix on their registration plates .
#Text=See
#Text=Pidgeon Island National Park is just to the north of Gros Islet .
#Text=Beaches
#Text=There are a number of beaches within walking distance of Gros Islet .
#Text=Reduit Beach - this is the most popular beach on the west coast , with the best amenities .

#Text=It 's only a few hundred metres from the beaches on the seafront at Gros Islet , but as the marina entrance is between the two , it 's a good 30 minutes walk back along the main road and past the marina and then turn right at the shopping mall .
#Text=Cas en Bas - on the east cost , this can be reached by following the ( occasionally dirt ) road that goes past the Cotton Bay Village resort .
#Text=The beach has a couple of restaurants , but is still largely untouched .
#Text=It s a popular spot for kite surfing and a kite surfing school operates from here .
#Text=Anse Lavoutte - This is an almost completely secluded and untouched beach just around the headland to the south of Cas en Bas .
#Text=It 's popular with kite surfers and locals , who tend to drive there in the 4-wheel drive cars .
#Text=Gros Islet Beach - narrow beach on the seafront of Gros Islet town .
#Text=Pigeon Point Beach - about 1 km long , north of Gros Islet town .
#Text=The first half of the beach is undeveloped .
#Text=There are usually few people , except on weekends .
#Text=The second half of the beach is developed with Landings and Sandals Grande resorts .
#Text=Do
#Text=Every Friday evening , the streets of Gros Islet are closed off to cars and a vibrant street party ( " The Jump-up " ) takes place .
#Text=The bars stay open till late and numerous street vendors set up stalls selling local food .
#Text=Rodney Bay Marina .
#Text=The main yacht marina on Saint Lucia .
#Text=It has good amenities and a range of overpriced cafes selling European food .
#Text=Kite surfing .
#Text=The windier beaches to the east of Gros Islet are popular with kite surfers .
#Text=If you do n't have your own kite , you can hire one ( or arrange lessons ) at the Kite Surfing St. Lucia on the Cas en Bas beach .
#Text=Snuba Saint Lucia , Pigeon Island , ☏ +1758 484-3346 .
#Text=3 .
#Text=Snuba is the ultimate happy-medium for those wanting to go beyond snorkeling without the training and concerns associated with a deep dive .
#Text=The tour begins from a sandy beach and descends to a maximum depth of 20 feet .
#Text=There is no need to surface for air or to tussle with bulky equipment .
#Text=US$ 75 .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Rodney Bay Mall , about 5-10 minutes walk south of the marinaa , has a good range of shops and a well-stocked supermarket .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Somewhere Special
#Text=Restaurant and Bar
#Text=, 18 Marie Therese St ( Follow the main road in Gros Islet , turn right at the second last street before sea .
#Text=Grey concrete house with pillars on the left hand side ) , ☏ +1758 450-8481 or +1 758 519-5787 , ✉ somewhere_special_restaurant_bar@yahoo.com .
#Text=8AM to 10PM .
#Text=Open for breakfast , lunch and dinner .
#Text=Local and international cuisine available .
#Text=Internet Wifi and reasonable laundry service also available .
#Text=From EC$ 6 .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Almond
#Text=Morgan Bay
#Text=, Choc Bay , toll-free : +1-800-4ALMOND .
#Text=All-inclusive resort covering 22 acres set amongst palms with a beach on a secluded cove .
#Text=Almond Smugglers Cove , Cap Estates .
#Text=A spacious , village-style resort located on 60 acres of lush tropical gardens .
#Text=Bay Guesthouse , Bay St ( Seafront of Gros Islet ) , ☏ +1758 450-8956 , ✉ relax@bay-guesthouse.com .
#Text=Check-in : 2PM , check-out : 11AM .
#Text=A relaxed atmosphere where each room has a private bathroom , free wifi and communal patio overlooking the sea with hammocks .
#Text=From US$ 20 pppn .
#Text=Glencastle Resort , Massade , ☏ +1758 450-0833 , fax : +1758 450-0837 , ✉ glencastle@candw.ic .
#Text=From US$ 75 single/$ 97 double .

#Text=Hotel Chez Marie Alish , Massade-Gros-Islet ( On the right of the main road through Gros Islet , just before the Police station ) , ☏ +1758 450-0482 or +1 758 450-8332 , fax : +1758 450-8279 , ✉ chezmarielish@hotmail.com .
#Text=Self-catering apartments .
#Text=US$ 60 single/$ 65 double .

#Text=Nelson 's Furnished Apartments , Cas En Bas Rd ( 5 minutes up the hill on the road that is the first right , just after the junction with the road to Gros Islet ) , ☏ +1758 450-8275 , fax : +1758 450-9108 , ✉ nelsonapartment@hotmail.com .
#Text=Check-out : noon .
#Text=A very clean , well-equipped and friendly establishment , with views overlooking the marina .
#Text=One of the cheapest options and with good wireless .
#Text=From US$ 45 .
#Text=Stephanie 's Hotel , Massade ( opposite the turning to Gros Islet on the road that goes past Rodney Bay Marina ) , ☏ +1758 450-8689 or +1 758 450-8850 , ✉ stephaniehotel@hotmail.com .
#Text=From US$ 53 without kitchen/$ 65 with .
#Text=La Panache ( La Panache Oceanview Guesthouse ) , Hill Top Avenue ( Cas En Bas Corner ) .
#Text=The La Panache St. Lucia Caribbean guesthouse is located near Gros Islet , Rodney Bay and the marina yacht harbour on a hill with a stunning view .
#Text=All apartments are equipped with a basic kitchen , bathrooms , balconies and spacious beds with fans and mosquito netting .
#Text=Towels and bed linen are provided .
#Text=High speed wireless Internet access is free .
#Text=$ 65 .
